name: Petrichor II
description:
Petrichor II

A Game By Francois O'Kennedy

Controls:

  • W/Up Arrow - Walk Forward 
  • Left Arrow - Turn Left 
  • Right Arrow - Turn Right 
  • Down Arrow - Walk Backward 
  • E - Action Tab - Inventory 
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • ESC - Exit Game

All copyright and other intellectual property including Paxzifizia and its lore remains the rights of Francois O’Kennedy & Cursed Entertainment 2021
